GeneDef.label: resurgent
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene accumulate resurgent cells over time. With the help of these cells, the host can resurrect or resurrect others.
GeneDef.resourceDescription:
A reserve of dormant cells that can be spent for various purposes.

Resurgent cells cannot be increased by any means, they regenerate themselves depending on genes and some external factors.

If the number of cells falls below 5, then most of the resurgent genes will be deactivated.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Gives resurgent supply.

In the presence of the <color=#8a8ae6>"Undead"</color> gene, this gene changes the resurrection mechanics. Instead of age, resurgent cells will be spent. Requires <color=#8a8ae6>37 resurgent cells</color>.

GeneDef.label: resurgent genetic
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have special resurgent cells that protect their genetic code from most influences.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carriers of this gene cannot use xenotype serums.
Abilities "Rise from the Dead", "Reimplanter" and "Natural reimplanter" do not work on carriers of this gene.

GeneDef.label: resurgent fungus
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a symbiotic parasitic fungus. This fungus does not have a noticeable effect on the host but significantly increases the production of resurgent cells.

GeneDef.label: resurgent healing
GeneDef.description: In carriers of this gene, resurgent cells can regenerate lost limbs or heal wounds.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Restores a lost limb or heals scars every (*DateTime)1-2 days(/DateTime).
Requires 13 resurgent cells.

GeneDef.label: resurgent ageless
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene completely stop aging after reaching the age of 18.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carriers of the gene always spawn with age within 18.
The age of the gene carrier decreases by 1 year every (*DateTime)1-2 days(/DateTime), this continues until the resurgent cells run out or the carrier reaches the minimum adult age.
Requires 6 resurgent cells.

GeneDef.label: resurgent clotting
GeneDef.description: In carriers of this gene, resurgent cells can quickly stop bleeding and treat wounds.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Treat wounds from time to time.
Requires 1 resurgent cell for each wound.

GeneDef.label: resurgent blood
GeneDef.description: In carriers of this gene, resurgent cells with sufficient saturation completely stop bleeding.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Bleeding depends on the amount of accumulated resurgent cells.
Changes blood filth color to dark blue.
Refresh time (*DateTime)~1 day(/DateTime).

GeneDef.label: resurgent stomach
GeneDef.description: In carriers of this gene, resurgent cells significantly improve digestion.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Hunger rate factor depends on the amount of accumulated resurgent cells.
Refresh time (*DateTime)~1 day(/DateTime).

GeneDef.label: resurgent sleep
GeneDef.description: In carriers of this gene, resurgent cells optimize metabolic processes and reduce the load on neuronal clusters, which reduces the need for sleep.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Rest fall rate factor depends on the amount of accumulated resurgent cells.
Refresh time (*DateTime)~1 day(/DateTime).

GeneDef.label: resurgent spores
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have special glands in their palms. They can saturate the soil with resurgent spores by touch, which will allow the growth of a resurgent tree.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Makes it possible to plant a resurgent tree at the cost of 66 cells.
The resurgent tree slowly pollutes the soil around it and raises walking corpses.
Also, the tree once a year will spawn babies that inherit the genes of one of the owners of this gene in the settlement.
If all the owners of this gene are dead or absent in the settlement, then the tree will stop spawning babies.
Walking corpses are eternally hungry aberrations that will protect the settlement until death.
